description.value:
Hired to aid the group in some action, can attack a target on behest or fight alongside them. Requisition test based off of nature of target, willingness of the alien, and scale.

Requirements

Xenos Mercanaries to perform some violent action such as Kroot, Ork Freebootas, and Sslyth.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
description.summary: Hired to aid the group in some action, can attack a target on behest or fight alongside them. Requisition test based off of nature of target, willingness of the alien, and scale.
